Package pl.kernelpanic.dbmonster Description

The main package of DBMonster.

DBMonster is a tool which helps application developers with tuning the structure of the database, tuning usage of indexes and testing the application performance under heavy database load. DBMonster is a tool which generates random data and puts it into the SQL database.
